intent.goal: Generate cozy scrapbook-style list posters with a central subject and handwritten notes around it

content.center_image_description: A smiling traveler wearing a beanie and backpack.
content.text_theme_description: Things to never forget when going on a camping trip.

style.overall_vibe: cozy, handwritten, diary-style aesthetic on grid notebook paper, with doodles and handwritten notes scattered around a central cut-out portrait

title_style.extra_accents: small red doodle marks around the title

generated_text_items_style.distribution: scattered naturally around all sides of the center image
generated_text_items_style.line_accents: red underline, circles, arrows, stars, asterisks
generated_text_items_style.length_per_item: short phrases or one short sentence each

doodles.placement: mixed between text items to create a dynamic scrapbook look

composition.balance: central focus with text evenly spaced around the subject
